## WorkerFixtures interface

Set of [fixtures](https://playwright.dev/docs/test-fixtures) provided by assistive-playwright-test at the worker level.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface WorkerFixtures extends WorkerOptions 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [WorkerOptions](./assistive-playwright-test.workeroptions.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [screenReader](./assistive-playwright-test.workerfixtures.screenreader.md) | [ScreenReaderClient](./assistive-playwright-client.screenreaderclient.md) | Reference to the ScreenReaderClient object that gives access to messages from the screen reader. |
|  [vm](./assistive-playwright-test.workerfixtures.vm.md) | [VM](./vm-providers.vm.md) | Reference to the current virtual machine. |
|  [vmKeyboard](./assistive-playwright-test.workerfixtures.vmkeyboard.md) | [VMKeyboard](./assistive-playwright-client.vmkeyboard.md) | Reference to the VMKeyboard object that allows to control the keyboard at the virtual machine level (low-level enough so that the screen reader can catch those keyboard events). |
|  [vmMouseCalibrate](./assistive-playwright-test.workerfixtures.vmmousecalibrate.md) | [CalibrateMouseFunction](./assistive-playwright-client.calibratemousefunction.md) | Mouse calibration function, allowing to calibrate the mouse for a specific page. |
|  [vmPlaywrightPortRedirection](./assistive-playwright-test.workerfixtures.vmplaywrightportredirection.md) | [PortRedirection](./vm-providers.portredirection.md) | Specifies how the virtual machine port from the [vmPlaywrightPort](./assistive-playwright-test.workeroptions.vmplaywrightport.md) setting can be reached from the host machine. |
